section.28: The Book of Oaths, Muharibin, Qasas (Retaliation), and Diyat (Blood Money)

hadiths.text: Imran b. Husain reported that a person bit the arm of another person; he pulled it out and his foretooth fell down. This matter was taken to Allah's Apostle (ï·º), and he turned it down saying:Did you want to eat his flesh?
